program.name: librsync
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; *-hpux11.[01]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -Ae +ESlit +Ofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-hpux11*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-rpath " ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="${SB_VAR_LIBZ+-I${SB_VAR_LIBZ_INC}}\ ${SB_VAR_BZIP+-I${SB_VAR_BZIP_INC}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT+-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC}}" \ LDFLAGS="${SB_VAR_LIBZ+-L${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_BZIP+-L${SB_VAR_BZIP_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT+-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_BZIP+${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_BZIP_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT+${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}}\ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" --enable-shared --enable-static \ --disable-trace --disable-dependency-tracking \ --libdir=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB} --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

item.para: Yet more large file support fixes
C++ support for easy #include <librsync.h> in C++
Removed Debian files from dist tarball
Changed rdiff to an installed program on "make install"
Refactored delta calculation code to be cleaner and faster
#879763: Fixed mdfour to work on little-endian machines which don't like unaligned word access. This should make librsync work on pa-risc, and it makes it slightly faster on ia64.
#1022764: Fix corrupted encoding of some COPY commands in large files
#1024881: Print long integers directly, rather than via casts to double
Fix printf formats for size_t: both the format and the argument should be cast to long
Changed installed include file from rsync.h to librsync.h
Rollsum bugfix that produces much smaller deltas
mdfour bigendian and >512M bugfix, plus optimisations patch
autoconf/automake updates and cleanups for autoconf 2.53
MacOSX compilation patch, modified to autoconf vararg macro fix.
Remove support for RHEL 3 and SLES
On HPUX, pass +Ofltacc in CFLAGS instead of +Onofltacc
